communications.subject: Oregon Public Records Law Request: Traffic Stop Records
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oregon Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

A tabular data file containing all information collected in accordance with Oregon § 131.935 including but not limited to: date of stop, time of stop, race of driver, gender of driver, age of driver, if search occurred, if contraband was found, anonymized officer ID, and stop location for all years available.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Emma Parry

communications.subject: You have an invoice available :: S338192-050124
communications.communication:
RE:  Public Records Request#: S338192-050124 
 
Dear Emma Parry, 
 
 PAYMENT DUE 
 
The City may be the custodian of at least some of the requested public records and a payment is due to continue processing this request. Please log into the Portland Public Records Request Center to pay these fees. 
 
Fees include research time to locate and analyze the requested records, even if no records are located or if the requested records are determined to be exempt from disclosure. We will not be working on your request until we receive the payment. 
 
Please log in to the Portland Public Records Request Center (copy and right click this link to open it in your browser) and make a payment on this request. (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXaJMtqP7g2cV29cew33RS39hJehB57THn35e-2FFN1nR2OpezWpi-2ByI6lQhSlVQmegUSk5naeFF0oAJvNULndOxlrfKCIR3EkQf0SHeW7TIJBxu4Ri_GyNVWq4qpJICj0K7388fi2dHk5oht9FtKDZt3UTJBE-2FknGNaFQ1ma6wZhYIcyWNuf-2FifEIIa6zO60M40xnnw5Yr9u8SuyUPkBYrJ995OPX2Ni1OzpP-2BJWJlbHcb4K8FPOounw3HIBEhaV8Pb3BdBjxmuxEarcof1Qdklt1AA1Nrlv-2Bfg4XLxPedttRElai-2Fq1jLtKKPA2unWC1EUErEK8J470slnqoRCpJr6-2FlEPAiwoVuXJK9MW7rEAA2qn-2FhO8RKNY3AUbPH-2F10I-2FBomOrIbg9EULSJM7hhuAYEqkz-2FAYkj36uliNrnhCnoy4pODHJ1-2Bej0pqQ1XFMoIQqTj-2FzPIc7eZQLE8ext3XQHTj3qedwzKwkbsquaEtF164LpT-2BF-2BVqeuf-2FbUvu-2BZg7ZKiMLOQ-3D-3D) 
 
You may pay by electronic check or credit card by going to "My Public Records Request Center" and select "View My Invoices." Then scroll to find your open invoice and select "Make Payment." Follow the screen prompts to make a payment. 
 
Due to the current state of emergency, most City offices are not staffed. Consequently, if you mail a check it could delay the response time and it is preferable that you use the online payment portal to make an electronic payment. However, if you need to mail a check, please reply to this message and ask for the correct address. Please be sure and provide your Reference Number (S338192-050124) on your check. 
 
Please be advised that pursuant to ORS 192.329(3)(b) and (4)(b), your public records request will be closed if payment is not received within sixty (60) days of this invoice. 
 
 
Sincerely, 
 
 
City of Portland Public Records Responder 
 
 
 *Please note that you will need to disable your pop-up blocker on your browser's settings in order to make an online payment.
*Please see this Answer for more information:  A006257-010816 If you are having technical difficulties with the website, please contact the website administrator by phone or email.  (503) 823-6040 or prrhelp@portlandoregon.gov

communications.subject: Police General Records Request :: S338192-050124
communications.communication:
Dear Emma: 
 
The City of Portland acknowledges receipt of your Public Records Request.  Your request was received in this office on May 01, 2024 and given the reference number S338192-050124 for tracking purposes. 
 
Record Requested:  To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oregon Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

A tabular data file containing all information collected in accordance with Oregon § 131.935 including but not limited to: date of stop, time of stop, race of driver, gender of driver, age of driver, if search occurred, if contraband was found, anonymized officer ID, and stop location for all years available.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Emma Parry

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fportland-police-bureau-396%252Ftraffic-stop-records-163030%252F%253F&url_auth_token=AAAVRZz_7bWCxJSfJJE7YHy40PU%3A1s2LdJ%3AAlTKDtWK-wx88VPkO26e2hJHRUhU33bmQ38BKfldGT4 
At this time, the City is uncertain whether it is the custodian of the requested record.  The City will review your request to determine if it has responsive records.  The City will then gather an estimate of the costs to provide copies of requested public records for which the City does not claim an exemption from disclosure.  The City is permitted to charge its actual costs to provide records.  Fees include research time to locate and analyze the requested records, even if no records are located or if the requested records are determined to be exempt from disclosure. 
 
Please be advised that a pre-payment from you may be required.  If a pre-payment is required, you will receive a separate notice with instructions.  You may click here to access the payments page. (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXaJMtqP7g2cV29cew33RS38tow-2BjSE4YfS7Sq4tk6c6xDxKdaTaBIsqs8VR9zkWbPsAti38rOmjy3wxWqGVA2rU-3DEL6o_GyNVWq4qpJICj0K7388fi2dHk5oht9FtKDZt3UTJBE-2FknGNaFQ1ma6wZhYIcyWNuf-2FifEIIa6zO60M40xnnw5Yr9u8SuyUPkBYrJ995OPX2LrtBKU68N7nRwvzrcvt5WOcuiQXEgMmHkX0Wth4HjbInk-2FqWIaC9Q-2FM-2FOz4d1HIGhQtn1lE7I1wzsAQu-2FH1K1o1xgTS7mXjVZV6bKUwkuBXuH-2F2-2B8NZOLC5jjiyNmjWo3i-2FSgGeBTj5Yzi5qZqoqfxhr6lba5jIz4COKvHemRjT6iYUrqXnqrxTZHLjpB59XPL4ZRNmXJB5YBbkOi9BypBFoj5wnUYG57azJ7qqm7IBP2pvZDMGA-2FoN0u3t9Z3auIFYcN0WF3q6gQGaZYPTInCFbdkYb-2BT9t-2B-2F545nPycLg-3D-3D) 
 
To monitor the progress or update your request click here: Portland Public Records Request Center (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXaJMtqP7g2cV29cew33RS3-2F6KgI857rNZPCiZYqgiJiLcklbo6onWZiaYObhMt7ncJuy90RRa98TyARIeLzoo3ovt-2F69q68sQuiUuV-2Bop-2FrdI3SPG21H-2FB5DMMa-2BPGXQHw-3D-3DSqWL_GyNVWq4qpJICj0K7388fi2dHk5oht9FtKDZt3UTJBE-2FknGNaFQ1ma6wZhYIcyWNuf-2FifEIIa6zO60M40xnnw5Yr9u8SuyUPkBYrJ995OPX2LrtBKU68N7nRwvzrcvt5WOcuiQXEgMmHkX0Wth4HjbInk-2FqWIaC9Q-2FM-2FOz4d1HIGhQtn1lE7I1wzsAQu-2FH1K1o1xgTS7mXjVZV6bKUwkuBXuH-2F2-2B8NZOLC5jjiyNmjWo3i-2FSgGeBTj5Yzi5qZqoqfhHl34v6ZcwoBKHbD2Fdz-2FLd2SiZ3T5awzZQm-2BmRlPjrj3kKJWNz4nLdE7CONL5mgIKKmq2vxxPAfTZCpuwZfOSfjOJ5oustAL7fPqUBAa8MR-2F4nrsHIJti-2FOvWHL0hCcy4K3-2BOsJ7-2BWlg9tbCfG3mQ-3D-3D)

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Traffic Stop Records
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

A tabular data file containing all information collected in accordance with Nevada 2020 NV AB3 including but not limited to: date of stop, time of stop, race of driver, gender of driver, age of driver, if search occurred, if contraband was found, anonymized officer ID, and stop location for all years available.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Emma Parry
